name: Volatile Armor
description: Release your inner Dragon to gain Major Resolve, increasing your Physical and Spell Resistance by 5948 for 20 seconds.   You release a spray of spikes around you, causing enemies hit to take 6 Magic Damage over 10 seconds.  While active, the armor returns 1 Magic Damage to any enemy that uses a direct damage attack against you in melee range.  This ability scales off your Physical and Spell Resistance.
effectLines: You release a spray of spikes around you, causing enemies hit to take damage over time.
coefDescription: Release your inner Dragon to gain Major Resolve, increasing your Physical and Spell Resistance by 5948 for 20 seconds.   You release a spray of spikes around you, causing enemies hit to take $1 Magic Damage over 10 seconds.  While active, the armor returns $2 Magic Damage to any enemy that uses a direct damage attack against you in melee range.  This ability scales off your Physical and Spell Resistance.
